backend/main.mo: Primary canister actor defining state, types, and APIs for episodes, characters, clans, gallery, news, scripts, and ProBlocks with admin authorization and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting OldCharacter to NewCharacter by adding portraitUrl and returning updated actor state on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for character portrait enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of key frontend files including hooks, sections, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS layer defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the root React element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app that switches between main site, admin, and pro modes using hash-based routing.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gate component that checks identity and admin status to show login prompt, unauthorized message, or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Renders the main admin dashboard with tabs for managing site content, navigation controls, and conditional admin-only sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Provides CRUD UI for characters, including metadata encoding, clan selection, and portrait upload handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Implements clan management with creation, editing, deletion, and metadata encoding for clan details.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Handles creating, editing, reordering, and deleting episodes with thumbnail uploads and production‑progress fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Manages gallery items with image upload, metadata encoding, and CRUD dialogs for artwork entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting news posts using query hooks and dialog forms.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Admin panel to manage scripts with create, update, delete, and permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Interface for managing team roles, granting and revoking permissions, and validating admin access.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Animated character display card showing portrait, clan color accents, and character details.
Small badge showing a clan’s name and accent color with optional motion effects.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Detailed animated clan card featuring sigil, badge, description, and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Episode preview card displaying episode metadata and an optional watch button.
Displays an episode in a dialog with title, summary, and an embedded video player or a missing-video alert.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Renders a filterable image grid with category tabs and click handling for opening images.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Shows a full-screen lightbox for gallery images with keyboard navigation and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Provides a dialog for uploading and validating gallery images, including drag‑and‑drop and metadata submission.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating news posts with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Displays a news post with title, author, formatted timestamp, and content.
Restricts content to authenticated admins and redirects unauthorized users by clearing the hash.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Encodes and decodes Pro presentation blocks to and from JSON with basic validation.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProPresentat: Manages and displays editable presentation blocks in Pro mode or read-only blocks otherwise, loading saved data on mount.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Zustand store managing Pro presentation blocks with add, update, remove, and initialization helpers.
Defines ProBlock and ProPresentationDocument type structures.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProToolbar.t: UI toolbar for adding text blocks and saving Pro presentation content via mutation.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated About/Story section showing feature cards with icons and reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Fetches characters, decodes metadata, and displays character cards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Loads clans, merges backend metadata with static styling, displays clan cards, and includes world map section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Fetches episodes, decodes metadata, lists episodes, and opens a player dialog for released ones.
Footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and reveal-on-scroll animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Loads gallery items from backend or static fallback, handles lightbox and upload dialog, and displays a grid of images with optional admin upload button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Provides a responsive navigation bar with scroll effects, smooth section scrolling, mobile menu, and optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the animated hero section with parallax background, particle effects, and title content respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Displays news posts with loading/error states, profile setup flow, admin post creation, and sorted post listing.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Draws clickable SVG hotspots over a world map, managing refs and keyboard interaction to trigger location selection.
Shows a dialog with lore details for a selected map location, including title, region, clan, and descriptive text.
React section displaying a world map with interactive hotspots, animated reveal effects, and a lore dialog for selected regions.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines the Character interface and a list of character profiles with clan, personality, powers, and roles.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines the Clan interface and data for each clan, including descriptions, colors, and sigil asset paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Provides the Episode interface and Season 1 episode list with titles, summaries, status, and optional media URLs.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item types and a small set of gallery entries with categories and image metadata.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Contains world map location definitions with coordinates, clan ties, lore text, and SVG path shapes for hotspots.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling login, identity loading, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Provides a hook that applies scroll-based parallax transforms to an element, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates on system changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, episodes, and admin actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Implements scroll-triggered reveal animations using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom anime-themed color variables and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Provides encode/decode helpers for embedding metadata in text fields and resolves styling from clan data.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates image uploads by type and size and converts them to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, shadows, and extended theme utilities for the site's UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the anime website’s goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
